newsitem.title: PERU: Peru Jan inflation 0.48 pct vs 1.2 pct Jan 1996.
newsitem.headline: Peru Jan inflation 0.48 pct vs 1.2 pct Jan 1996.

text.p: Peruvian consumer prices rose 0.48 percent in January, compared with a 1.2 percent rise in January last year and 1.2 percent in December, the government said on Saturday.
Consumer prices in Peru rose 11.84 percent in 1996, compared with a 10.23 percent rise in 1995.
The government estimates accumulated inflation will be nine percent this year and will drop to "the level of industrialized countries" by 2000.
